title: Sir! Sir!
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Tom Daly and Michael Rubbo
brief_description: Here is what happened in a Toronto classroom when teachers occupied the children’s desks and children became the teachers. The film grew out of another, Mrs. Ryan’s Drama Class, where young children found their way into creative drama. There is food for thought in this impromptu reversal of roles.
